events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department as per your software development experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the hiring manager was impressed with your technical background.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled later this week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC with our senior software engineering team.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills and knowledge relevant to the role.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 10th, which will focus on cultural fit and role expectations.
Your HR interview went very well. The team was impressed by your communication skills and enthusiasm for the position.
We are pleased to extend an offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package to match your expertise.
You have provided feedback regarding the offer and expressed your excitement to join our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We look forward to welcoming you aboard as a new member of our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to company resources, introductory sessions, and team meetings scheduled.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with you officially joining the company as a Software Engineer.
